text: ci ʙaso dehaho, ki mardumasro ʙa saʙaʙi ito'at nakardanason amri Moro ʙa halokat rasonidaem va azoʙi mo hangomi saʙ jo on goh, ki ʙa xoʙi nisfiruzi furu rafta ʙudand, ʙa onon darrasid. (Alloh in du vaqtro maxsus zikr namudaast, zero in du vaqt; vaqti oromis va istirohatand. Pas omadani azoʙ dar in vaqtho ʙadtar va saxttar ast)
